# Appendix

##  Modena dialect orthography

### Vowels
|Character|Description|Example|
|----|-----------------------------------|-------------------------|
|**a**|pronounced like in Italian|*aqua*, acqua|
|**à**|closed sound|*dànna*, donna|
|**â**|prolonged sound|*mâż*, maggio|
|**e**|pronounced like in Italian|*vàddress*, vedersi|
|**è**|open sound|*venerdè*, venerdì|
|**é**|closed sound|*méll*, mille|
|**ê**|prolonged sound|*andê*, andato|
|**i**|pronounced like in Italian|*furmintòun*, frumento|
|**î**|prolonged sound|*vistî*, vestito|
|**o**|pronounced like in Italian|*lonedè*, lunedì|
|**ò**|open sound|*pòch*, poco|
|**ó**|closed sound|*mói*, bagnato|
|**ô**|prolonged sound|*fiô*, figli|

### Consonants
|Character|Description|Example|
|----|-----------------------------------|-------------------------|
|**c'**||*vèc'*, vecchio|
|**c**||*còch*, cocco|
|**g'**||*apòg'*, appoggio|
|**g**||*fógh*, fuoco|
|**ʃ**||*nèʃ**, naso|
|**s'c**||*s'ciafòun*, schiaffone|
|**ż**||*żél*, gelo|
|**z**||*zél*, cielo|
